thread.title: Emma Stone Discusses The La La Land Best Picture Shocker
thread.title_full: Emma Stone Discusses The La La Land Best Picture Shocker

title: Emma Stone Discusses The La La Land Best Picture Shocker

organizations.name: oscar winners missed the ceremony because of trump’s travel ban

text:
Emma Stone backstage: "I was also holding my Best Actress card at that time ... I don’t know what happened." #Oscars pic.twitter.com/FS11XVo11y 
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Whatever behind-the-scenes mix-up led to that Moonlight-La La Land shake-up – in which Warren Beatty was somehow given a Best Actress envelope that had Emma Stone’s name on it and took that to mean her film La La Land won Best Picture over actual winner Moonlight – Emma Stone says her Best Actress card isn’t to blame. After rumors that presenter Leonardo DiCaprio placed her card back in the Best Actress envelope contributed to the confusion , Stone said after the ceremony that she was holding onto her card through the massive error (it also appears that PWC keeps two separate envelopes containing the name of each winner). “I was holding my Best Actress in a Leading Role card that entire time,” Stone told the press pool. “I don’t mean to start stuff, but whatever story that was — I had that card.”
Tags: awards season oscars 2017 emma stone moonlight la la land best picture More Emma Stone Says Her Best Actress Envelope Wasn’t To Blame   3 mins ago WATCH: Two Oscar Winners Missed the Ceremony Because of Trump’s Travel Ban Iranian director Asghar Farhadi and Syrian cinematographer Khaled Khateeb did not attend.
11 mins ago Emma Stone Says Her Best Actress Envelope Not to Blame for Best Picture Shocker “I don’t mean to start stuff, but whatever story that was — I had that card.”
21 mins ago WATCH: The Oscars Got Political Okay, it was mostly Jimmy Kimmel.
